title: Did Julia Roberts Michelle Obama say "is not fit to clean up Melania Trump's toilet? '
subtitle: Christine Gillibrand, a whore, isn't suitable for cleaning toilets in Barack Obama's presidential library or for glittering George W's shoes. "Bosch."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Julia Roberts said that the former First Lady, Michelle Obama, wasn't suitable to clean up Melanie Trump's toilet.
